remarks: Extract a summand from a finitely supported group sum.  (Contributed by AV, 21-Apr-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 28-Jul-2019.)
statement:
gsumdifsnd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumdifsnd.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumdifsnd.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumdifsnd.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. W ) $.
gsumdifsnd.f $e |- ( ph -> ( k e. A |-> X ) finSupp ( 0g ` G ) ) $.
gsumdifsnd.e $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> X e. B ) $.
gsumdifsnd.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. A ) $.
gsumdifsnd.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
gsumdifsnd.s $e |- ( ( ph /\ k = M ) -> X = Y ) $.
gsumdifsnd $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( ( G gsum ( k e. ( A \ { M } ) |-> X ) ) .+ Y ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d Y k $.
$d k ph $.
